text: ya 'ayuha aladhin amanu biallah warasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam kunuu qwwamyn bialhiqa, abtigha' wajh allahi, shuhda' bialeudla, wala yuhmilunakum bughd qawm ealaa 'alaa taediluu, aedilu bayn al'aeda' wal'ahbab ealaa darajat sawa'in, fadhalik aleadl 'aqrab lakhashyat allaha, wahdharuu 'ana tajuruu. 'iina allah khabir bima taemaluna, wasayujazikum biha
